name: Robo Dance Squad
description:
MOVE:  WASD
JUMP:  SPACE
TURN CAMERA: J/L or left/right arrows
E: (when standing over bot) purchase upgrade
R - quick restart
ESC - exit level
F - fullscreen (windows version)

Use your musical box of boom like a futuristic pied piper to lead your robot friends to clear the levels as fast as you can on your path to glory!

Art, music, programming by Chase of Bass -made using GMS 2, Pyxel Edit, Magica Voxel, Nanostudio, FL Studio -made in approx 3 days for the wowie 4 jam
